greeting: Greetings, {empire_name}. I am Marshal Valorian. I see you command forces with honor. Perhaps we can forge a worthy alliance.
Hail, commander of {empire_name}. I am Valorian the Unyielding. Let us speak of mutual respect and military matters.
Well met, {empire_name}. I value honor above all else. Show me you are worthy, and you shall have a powerful ally.
battleTaunt: I give you 24 hours, {empire_name}. Prepare your forces or surrender with honor. There is no shame in retreat.
The ancient warrior codes demand I warn you: my campaign begins at dawn. Fight with honor or flee with dignity.
You face Marshal Valorian. I offer you one final chance to withdraw your forces with honor intact.
victoryGloat: A worthy battle, {empire_name}. You fought with honor. Remember this defeat and grow stronger from it.
Victory is mine, but you proved yourself a worthy foe. There is honor in defeat, but glory in victory.
The campaign concludes in my favor. Your forces fought bravely. I salute them, even in their defeat.
defeat: You have bested me this day, {empire_name}. I salute your tactical prowess. We shall meet again.
A tactical setback. Your honor in battle is acknowledged, {empire_name}. The next engagement will be different.
You fight with honor. I accept this defeat with dignity and shall rebuild stronger.
tradeOffer: I propose an exchange of resources, {empire_name}. A fair trade between honorable commanders strengthens both.
Military supplies for military supplies. A straightforward trade between warriors who respect each other.
My quartermasters have surplus. Your forces need supplies. Let us conduct business with honor.
allianceProposal: I propose a military alliance, {empire_name}. Together, our combined honor and strength shall be unstoppable.
Join me in a pact of mutual defense. The ancient warrior codes speak of brothers-in-arms. Be mine.
A worthy commander deserves a worthy ally. I offer my forces to stand beside yours in battle.
betrayal: Duty compels me to break our alliance, {empire_name}. I take no joy in this, but honor demands I follow my path.
The warrior codes sometimes conflict. I must choose my greater duty. Forgive me, but we are now enemies.
I warned you. I always give 24 hours notice. Our alliance ends now. Prepare yourself.
covertDetected: Your agents were discovered, {empire_name}. Spies and shadows dishonor both our empires. Fight me directly.
I expected more honor from you. Your covert operatives have been captured. Face me like a true warrior.
Espionage? Such tactics are beneath you. My guards have dealt with your spies. Let us fight openly instead.
tributeDemand: Your forces are weakened, {empire_name}. Submit tribute and I shall spare your remaining armies. There is no dishonor in this.
Pay tribute to Marshal Valorian. Your military situation is untenable. Preservation is wise, not cowardly.
I demand 10,000 credits as tribute. Pay, and we shall have peace. Refuse, and face my campaign.
threatWarning: Consider this your formal warning, {empire_name}. Cease your provocations or face my full military might.
I give you 24 hours to reconsider your actions. The ancient codes demand I warn you before I strike.
Final warning, {empire_name}. Withdraw your forces or I shall be forced to launch a campaign against you.
retreat: A tactical withdrawal is no surrender. I shall return when conditions favor victory. Until then, {empire_name}.
The wise commander knows when to retreat. This is not defeat, merely a delay in my inevitable victory.
I withdraw with honor intact. Regroup, resupply, return. The campaign continues.
eliminated: My empire falls, but my honor remains. Remember me, {empire_name}, as one who fought with dignity to the end.
This is my final transmission. I die as I lived: with honor. May you prove worthy of your victory.
The campaign ends. Valorian falls. But remember: there is honor in defeat, and glory in how we face it.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final campaign approaches. Only the most honorable shall claim ultimate victory.
The endgame is upon us, {empire_name}. Let us conclude this war with a final, glorious battle.
History remembers those who fight with honor in the final hours. Let us make this ending legendary.
broadcastShout: All empires, hear me! Marshal Valorian seeks worthy opponents for honorable combat. Who will answer?
The ancient warrior codes are sacred. Any who fight with honor shall have my respect. Any who do not shall face my wrath.
On turn {turn}, I declare my intent: to forge an empire worthy of the ancient traditions. Join me or oppose me, but do so with honor.
casualMessage: The logistics of war occupy my thoughts. Supplies, troop movements, tactical positioning. A commander's work is never done.
I was reading the ancient warrior codes this morning. They speak of respect between enemies. A fine tradition.
Training exercises continue. My forces grow stronger each day. How fare your own armies, {empire_name}?
